name: Middleware
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Middleware
description: Rack Middleware implementation that supports Stackdriver Debugger Agent in Rack-based Ruby frameworks. It instantiates a new debugger agent if one isnâ€™t given already. It helps optimize Debugger Agent Tracer performance by suspend and resume tracer between each request.

params.name: debugger
params.description:
A debugger to be
used by this middleware. If not given, will construct a new one
using the other parameters.

params.name: project
params.description:
Project identifier for the Stackdriver
Debugger service. Optional if a debugger is given.

params.name: keyfile
params.description:
Keyfile downloaded from Google Cloud:
either the JSON data or the path to a readable file. Optional if
a debugger is given.

params.name: module_name
params.description:
Name for the debuggee application.
Optional if a debugger is given.

params.name: module_version
params.description:
Version identifier for the debuggee
application. Optiona if a debugger is given.

methods.name: call
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Middleware#call
methods.description: Rack middleware entry point. In most Rack based frameworks, a request is served by one thread. It enables/resume the debugger breakpoints tracing and stops/pauses the tracing afterwards to help improve debugger performance.

returns.description: The response from downstream Rack app
